data.text:
@bruce_becker9 Yes I'm calling Tesla out here I lost respect for the company when I found out how they treat third party repairs and saw a 9 year model S being blown up because it was too expensive to repair this is not environmentally friendly.
I decided to look at the details

@bruce_becker9 In fact I think California should go more with with biofuel instead of EVs due to the poor state of their power grid.
They need to build some nuclear plants first.

@bruce_becker9 Growing more biofuel removes CO2 from the atmosphere so the net emissions are zero.
This is without the massive upfront cost of refining cobalt, lithium, rare earths to manufacture EVs as well as more copper to beef up the grid.
@Someday6Someday please feel free😊  I won't interact with them

@chan_lambda Although i see the comparative appeal of biofuels as attractive vs petroleum based fuel, it still burns carbon in air creating greenhouse gas.  You also use fuel and chemicals to grow the feedstock, and use energy to process into fuel.  Prefer not to put resources into this
@bruce_becker9 @angeleyez407 Yeah, but that makes too much sense. People like to bitch. especially when they can blame Prez Biden.
